name: EPISODE_PAUSE
description: This table contains data on past and present Social Care episode pause periods that currently exist in the system.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAUSE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The pause status category ID for the pause period.
entries: 12 - First Activity (Referral from Consultant or Allied Health Professional)
21 - Transfer to another Health Care Provider
32 - Start of Active Monitoring (Care Professional initiated)
24 - Non waiting, ongoing treatment/investigation in other department
Care plan / proposed treatment plan completed
Alteration in patient medical condition without hospital admission
Patient is unable to be contacted
Patient has been referred to another service
No measurable benefit from continuing the service
Risk to patient or staff prevents service provision
Patient/client death or bereavement phase end
Discharged to speciality palliative care provider
Discharged to other health care provider

columns.name: PAUSE_START_DATE
columns.description: The date when the pause was started.

columns.name: PAUSE_END_DATE
columns.description: The date when the pause was ended.

columns.name: PAUSE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The pause reason category ID for the pause period.
entries: <marquee>Tried to type with monster claws from Godzilla costume on</marquee>

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who most recently updated the pause period.

columns.name: UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time that a pause period was last updated.

columns.name: PAUSE_KEY
columns.description: This item contains the key used to identify a pause period (i.e. row in the HSB-64100 related group).
